main event: Richard S. Giroux observed strange, rapidly maneuvering lights in the sky over Sicily City, Missouri on August 2, 1964.
interesting points: The lights were red, green, and blue, and were about 1000 feet above the ground., Richard saw the lights at a distance of only 500 feet at their closest point., The lights maneuvered rapidly before shooting off at tremendous speed., Another observer, Giroux's wife, also witnessed the event., No wings or exhaust were visible, and there was no sound during the sighting.
witness description: Richard S. Giroux and his wife
